idea-plugin.name: Copy Files to Clipboard for LLM
idea-plugin.description: Combine and copy the content of multiple files or entire directories to the clipboard, organized by path and relative file names. Extensive settings allow for customizable file and directory exclusions. Ideal for providing better context to LLMs such as OpenAI's ChatGPT, Anthropic's Claude, Meta's LLaMA, and more.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
Version 1.0.5

  • Added directories support.
  • Added exclude directories setting.
  • Added exclude files by name setting.
  • Do not include empty files.

action.text: Combine and Copy Files to Clipboard
action.description: Combine and copy the content of selected files to the clipboard
